title: card.motion Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

count.description: The number of accelerometer motion events since the last card.motion request was made

status.description: The current status of the Notecard accelerometer

alert.description: If true, the Notecard's accelerometer detected a free-fall since the last request to card.motion

motion.description: Time of the last accelerometer motion event

seconds.description: Number of seconds since the last motion event

movements.description: String with motion counts in each bucket
